statements: UPDATE HistoricalBattles SET outcome = 'Victory' WHERE battle_id = 1;
UPDATE HistoricalBattles SET location = 'Hill Valley' WHERE battle_name = 'Battle of Hill Valley';
UPDATE HistoricalBattles SET outcome='Victory', location='Somewhere' WHERE battle_id=100
UPDATE HistoricalBattles SET battle_name='Battle of the Ages', battle_date='2021-09-15' WHERE participant_id=50
UPDATE historical_battles SET battle_name = 'Battle of Troy' WHERE battle_id = 'f5cb1fc6-11e9-4c16-8420-5bfbf77e57ad';
UPDATE participants SET participant_name = 'Achilles' WHERE participant_id = 'b3d44687-1dac-4dc1-9f71-0c2460d4f402';
UPDATE historical_battles SET battle_name = 'Battle of Waterloo', battle_date = '1815-06-18' WHERE battle_id = '22638c85-69da-4344-a453-3ceca3722820';
UPDATE participants SET participant_name = 'Duke of Wellington' WHERE battle_id = '22638c85-69da-4344-a453-3ceca3722820';
UPDATE Battles SET outcome='Victory' WHERE battle_id=1;
UPDATE Participants SET participant_role='Commander' WHERE participant_id=2;
UPDATE Battles SET outcome = 'Victory' WHERE battle_id = 1001;
UPDATE Outcomes SET outcome_description = 'Participant was a key strategist' WHERE outcome_id = 500;
UPDATE historical_battles SET battle_name = 'Battle of Hastings', outcome = 'Norman victory' WHERE battle_id = 1;
UPDATE battle_participants SET army_size = 5000, participant_name = 'King Harold' WHERE battle_id = 1;
UPDATE historical_battles SET location = 'Greece' WHERE battle_name = 'Battle of Thermopylae';
UPDATE battle_participants SET army_size = 50000, participant_name = 'Roman Legion' WHERE battle_id = (SELECT battle_id FROM historical_battles WHERE battle_name = 'Battle of Cannae');
UPDATE battles SET outcome = 'Victory' WHERE battle_name = 'Battle of Winterfell';
UPDATE participants SET role = 'Commander' WHERE participant_name = 'Jon Snow';
UPDATE battles SET location = 'Valley of Death', outcome = 'Victory' WHERE battle_id = '7cfc0432-22f4-4e5b-90ca-65a5111b6ea8';
UPDATE armies SET total_soldiers = 1500, commander_name = 'General Johnson' WHERE army_id = 'ba4c78a4-6520-4cae-97f1-fa5620c7a7bf';
